trans-unit.source: You can restore any protected folder for which you have Read-Write and Modify access permissions. If you do not have these permissions, an Access Refused error is raised when you try to restore.

seg-source.mrk: You can restore any protected folder for which you have Read-Write and Modify access permissions.
If you do not have these permissions, an Access Refused error is raised when you try to restore.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez restaurer tout dossier protégé pour lequel vous disposez d'autorisations d'accès en lecture-écriture et en modification.
Si vous ne disposez pas de ces autorisations, une erreur Accès refusé est déclenchée lorsque vous essayez de restaurer.

trans-unit.source: To restore a folder, you can launch the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in the agent interface or restore the folder from your Explorer.

seg-source.mrk: To restore a folder, you can launch the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in the agent interface or restore the folder from your Explorer.

target.mrk: Pour restaurer un dossier, vous pouvez lancer le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans l'interface de l'agent ou restaurer le dossier à partir de votre Explorer.
